import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import MayMay from '../img/maymay.png' import axios from 'axios'; function Login({ bearer, setBearer, setCurrentPage, setUserEmail, userEmail, setUserPassword, userPassword }) { function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); const headers = { Accept: "application/json", 'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8', } const userHeaders = { Accept: "application/json", Authorization: `Bearer ${bearer}` } axios({ url: "http://localhost:8000/v1/oauth/token", method: "post", data: { grant_type: "password", client_id: "2", client_secret: "kRZzELjTaLhjjumF6BIzOdXDgNP4bl2zeqxJRysZ", password: userPassword, username: userEmail, scope: "" }, headers, }) .then(res => setBearer(prevBearer => prevBearer = res.data.access_token)) .catch(err => console.log('error: ', err)) console.log(bearer) } useEffect(()=>{ axios({ url: "http://localhost:8000/api/user", method: "get", userHeaders, }) .then(response => console.log(response)) .catch(err => console.log('error: ', err)) },[bearer]) return (

MayMay

handleSubmit(e)}>
setUserEmail(e.target.value)} />

setUserPassword(e.target.value)} />

) } export default login
